My Excellency

The good and compassionate heart of Your Excellency João Bonifácio and others after the abdication; and if to a constituted nation, as Brazil was then, that providence was necessary, the nation of Rio Grande, which is engaged in the struggle defending its independence, has double reason to act likewise. These people are as audacious as they are shameless, and for that reason deserve to be treated as is fitting for the security of the State, etc., etc., etc.

Your Excellency

From Your Excellency’s sincere friend and obliged,
Almeida
S.C., March 27, 1839
